Nitobi.HyperLinkColumn

Nitobi.HyperLinkColumn Class Reference

When used in the Grid control, will show an anchor in the column and the raw value is expected to be a valid URL to the location to navigate to when the user clicks the link. For all other ColumnControlBase child classes the raw URL would be displayed with no anchor. More...

static HyperLinkColumn ()

Detailed Description

When used in the Grid control, will show an anchor in the column and the raw value is expected to be a valid URL to the location to navigate to when the user clicks the link. For all other ColumnControlBase child classes the raw URL would be displayed with no anchor.
